mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcSettlementMapper.selectHcSettlementSub] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.SETTL_NO , A.HMC_GR_NO , A.HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO , A.STOCK_ID , A.STOCK_CODE , (SELECT STK_DESC FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_ID = A.STOCK_ID AND STK_CODE = A.STOCK_CODE) AS STOCK_NAME , B.UOM , ( SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '42' AND CODE_ID = B.UOM ) AS UOM_NM , A.RCIPT_QTY , A.PO_UPRC , A.SUPLY_PRC , A.TAX , A.TAX_CD , ( SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '430' AND CODE_ID = A.TAX_CD ) AS TAX_NM , A.LOCAL_AMT , (A.SUPLY_PRC + A.TAX) AS TOTAL , B.CUR , ( SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '94' AND CODE_ID = B.CUR ) AS CUR_NM , A.PO_NO , A.PO_DTL_NO , A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , A.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO FROM HMC0013D A , HMC0005D B WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO AND A.SETTL_NO = #{sSettlNo} ORDER BY A.SETTL_NO, A.HMC_GR_NO, A.HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcSettlementMapper.selectSettlementDetailInfo] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.PO_NO , A.PO_DTL_NO , A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , A.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , A.HMC_GR_NO , A.HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO , A.STOCK_ID , A.STOCK_CODE , A.RCIPT_QTY , B.PO_UPRC , (A.RCIPT_QTY * B.PO_UPRC ) AS SUPLY_PRC , (A.RCIPT_QTY * (B.TAX/B.PO_QTY) ) AS TAX , B.TAX_CD , B.LOCAL_AMT , ( (A.RCIPT_QTY * B.PO_UPRC) + (A.RCIPT_QTY * (B.TAX/B.PO_QTY)) ) AS AMOUNT , B.CUR FROM HMC0010D A , HMC0005D B WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.HMC_GR_NO = #{hmcGrNo}
mapper.insert: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcSettlementMapper.insertSettlementDetail] - KR JIN */ INSERT INTO HMC0013D ( SETTL_NO --Settlement No , HMC_GR_NO --HomeCare GR Number , HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO --HomeCare GR Detail Number , STOCK_ID --Material , STOCK_CODE --Material Code , RCIPT_QTY --Quantity Received , PO_UPRC --Base PO Price , SUPLY_PRC --Supply Price , TAX --SST Amount , TAX_CD --Tax Code(430) , LOCAL_AMT --Local Amount , HMC_DELVRY_NO --Delivery Number , HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO --Delivery Detail Number , PO_NO --PO No , PO_DTL_NO --Po Detail No , CRT_DT --Create Date , CRT_USER_ID --Create User Id , UPD_DT --Update Date , UPD_USER_ID --Update User Id )VALUES( #{settlNo} --Settlement No , #{hmcGrNo} --HomeCare GR Number , #{hmcGrNoDtlNo} --HomeCare GR Detail Number , #{stockId} --Material , #{stockCode} --Material Code , #{rciptQty} --Quantity Received , #{poUprc} --Base PO Price , #{suplyPrc} --Supply Price , #{tax} --SST Amount , #{taxCd} --Tax Code(430) , #{localAmt} --Local Amount , #{hmcDelvryNo} --Delivery Number , #{hmcDelvryNoDtlNo} --Delivery Detail Number , #{poNo} --PO No , #{poDtlNo} --Po Detail No , SYSDATE , #{crtUserId} --Create User Id , SYSDATE , #{updUserId} --Update User Id )
